qas.question: In which nation was Friedrich Hayek born?
Friedrich Hayek name was commonly shortened to what?
What award did Hayek receive in 1974?
With whom did Hayek share his 1974 award?
Along with being an economist, what else was Hayek known as?

context: Friedrich Hayek CH (German: [ˈfʁiːdʁɪç ˈaʊ̯ɡʊst ˈhaɪ̯ɛk]; 8 May 1899 – 23 March 1992), born in <a0_0>Austria-Hungary<a0_0/> as Friedrich August von Hayek and frequently referred to as <a1_0>F. A. Hayek<a1_0/>, was an Austrian and British economist and <a4_0>philosopher<a4_0/> best known for his defense of classical liberalism. Hayek shared the 1974 <a2_0>Nobel Memorial Prize<a2_0/> in Economic Sciences with <a3_0>Gunnar Myrdal<a3_0/> for his "pioneering work in the theory of money and economic fluctuations and ... penetrating analysis of the interdependence of economic, social and institutional phenomena."
